{"id":870014139,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1672697391,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/870014139/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Detect Capital","memory":"43.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean detectCapitalUse(String word) {\n        if(word.length() == 0 || word.length() == 1) return true;\n        \n        if(Character.isUpperCase(word.charAt(0))){\n            boolean isFirstCharacter = Character.isUpperCase(word.charAt(1));\n            for(int i = 2; i < word.length(); i++){\n                boolean currentCharState = Character.isUpperCase(word.charAt(i));\n                if(currentCharState != isFirstCharacter) return false;\n            }\n        }else{\n            for(int i = 1; i < word.length(); i++){\n                if(Character.isUpperCase(word.charAt(i))) return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"detect-capital","has_notes":false}
